name: To The Bottom!
description:
In this jam project we explore the depths of a lake on an alien planet, what horrors lurk under the surface? Dive in and immerse yourself in this fully voiced, and kitted out submarine simulator, just be careful not to end up as lunch!

Art by BlueKea 

https://twitter.com/blueVkea?s=09

Coding & Voicework by Lucky Leaf Gaming 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjZIDYl6QcE2tE42CLiPACA
